channel.title: Mo-Pod.com - Raw Footage of the Mopar Nation
channel.description: At Mo-Pod.com you'll find videos that lead you anywhere, from the fastest track finish, to the local garage.
channel.itunes:subtitle: We deliver raw footage of the MOPAR nation at the click of a button.
channel.itunes:summary: At Mo-Pod.com, you'll find videos that lead you anywhere, from intense drift showdowns and racing champions, to the local garage and enthusiast car shows. You'll witness Hemi-powered muscle machines and awesome curbside burnouts, old s'kool legends and tricked-out DUB rides. Download a video or subscribe to our podcast to automatically receive the latest Mopar clips -it's all MoPowered! Send us your Mopar videos to make your debut on Mo-Pod.com! Check out our Web site for more details.
channel.itunes:author: Mopar

item.title: Tricked Out For Dirty Fun
item.description: Our pals at Monroeville Chrysler-Jeep show us how to outfit a stock Jeep with a few Mopar upgrades to make it rock-crawler ready!
item.author: Mopar
item.itunes:subtitle: Our pals at Monroeville Chrysler-Jeep show us how to outfit a stock Jeep with a few Mopar upgrades to make it rock-crawler ready!
item.itunes:summary: Our pals at Monroeville Chrysler-Jeep show us how to outfit a stock Jeep with a few Mopar upgrades to make it rock-crawler ready!
item.itunes:author: Mopar

item.title: Sideline the 9 to 5
item.description: Looking for the perfect setting for a wedding? Need a dependable commuter ride to get to work that doubles as a race-ready drift car? Take a lesson from these Mopar buffs on how to escape the daily grind! Check out another round of YOUR Mopar rides, supercharged for Mo-Pod.com.
item.author: Mopar
item.itunes:subtitle: Looking for the perfect setting for a wedding? Need a dependable commuter ride to get to work that doubles as a race-ready drift car? Take a lesson from these Mopar buffs on how to escape the daily grind! Check out another round of YOUR Mopar rides, supercharged for Mo-Pod.com.

item.title: Alley Cats
item.description: Muscle. Street. Speed. Trail. The four pillars of Mopar were well represented at the 2008 SEMA show in Las Vegas, NV. Come join us as we take a stroll down Mopar alley to check out the winners of the Mopar Top Eliminator Contest!

item.title: Northern Exposure!
item.description: The Mo-pod crew captured the "Crazy Swede," runner-up in the 2008 Formula Drift championship battle, on the podium at the August Seattle event. The boy's got skills!

item.title: Challenge This, Boy!
item.description: Mopar announces the new Dodge Challenger Drag Race Package Car at the 29th annual Mopar Mile-High Nationals with "Big Daddy" Don Garlits and Judy "Miss Mighty Mopar" Lilly at the starting line. "It's a scorpion!" said 17-time Top Fuel champ, Big Daddy.

item.title: Fast Times at Mile High
item.description: Looking for a good time? The Mopar Block Party at Mile High 2008 was chock-full of Mopar muscle, an inside glimpse into your favorite racers and hundreds of the Mopar faithful. Check it.

item.description: Blues-Rock Star Kenny Wayne Shepherd unveils his dream car at the 3rd Annual LX Platform Event in Irvine, California. Can Sam Hubinette steal the show when he starts burning rubber?

item.title: Snake Bite
item.description: Once you've got the bite, it becomes contagious. Here's the story of the most feared vehicle on the racetrack, the ACR evolution of a new breed of Dodge Viper all the way from its birthplace at the Viper Factory in Detroit, Michigan. Plus, a cliffhanger from our favorite Crazy Swede!
item.author: Mopar
item.itunes:subtitle: Once you've got the bite, it becomes contagious. Here's the story of the most feared vehicle on the racetrack, the ACR evolution of a new breed of Dodge Viper all the way from its birthplace at the Viper Factory in Detroit, Michigan. Plus, a cliffhanger from our favorite Crazy Swede!

item.description: The Team Mopar Don Schumacher Racing crew drops in for a visit to the ultimate car crib in Southern Cali - Tonight Show host Jay Leno's Garage!

item.title: Big Daddy's New Old Dragster
item.description: Don Garlits restores an old Swamp Rat with a brand-new 392 Hemi Crate Engine and shows the new motor how to do an old-fashioned burnout.

item.title: Ain't Nothing Small About Midget Racing
item.description: Kasey Kahne gets back to his racing roots by introducing the members of his Sprint and Midget car racing team. And, in a surprise announcement, you'll find out which NHRA champion will be driving a Sprint car this year.

item.description: Big Daddy Garlits tells the Mopar racers of a true Christmas miracle.

item.title: Slammin' into SEMA
item.description: Mopar brought out the big guns in Las Vegas. Check out Rob Richard's announcement of the new crate engines and the factory-direct drag racing program, along with all the HEMIS, Hotties and Beers at the 2007 SEMA show.

item.itunes:subtitle: Mopar brought out the big guns in Las Vegas. Check out Rob Richard's announcement of the new crate engines and the factory-direct drag racing program, along with all the HEMIS, Hotties and Beers at the 2007 SEMA show.

item.title: Attack of the MoPeople
item.description: Back from an exciting week at SEMA '08, Sam, Gary, Allen and Brady try to catch up on some lost Halloween loot. Warning: These scary costumes are not for the faint of heart.

item.title: Inside the Slide: Episode VI
item.description: Join Samuel Hubinette and the folks from The Drift Zone, the official podcast of the Formula Drift Series, as we peep some sweet drifting runs, and Sam, a.k.a the "Crazy Swede," drops an in-depth interview on what went down at the Round Five Sonoma throw down.

item.title: Inside the Slide: Episode V
item.description: Samuel Hubinette leaves the drifting course and tries his hand at circle track racing. Of course, the "Crazy Swede" can't resist dropping some drift demo runs on the fans and drivers at SoCal's Irwindale Speedway.

item.title: Livin' the Dream

item.title: Mopar Dominates Belleville Nats
item.description: Check out behind-the-scenes footage from the 30th annual Mopar Belleville Midget Nationals, where Jerry Coons, Jr. swept both nights of racing for title sponsor Mopar at the legendary Belleville High Banks racetrack in Kansas.
item.author: Mopar
item.itunes:subtitle: Check out behind-the-scenes footage from the 30th annual Mopar Belleville Midget Nationals, where Jerry Coons, Jr. swept both nights of racing for title sponsor Mopar at the legendary Belleville High Banks racetrack in Kansas.

item.title: Inside the Slide: Episode IV
item.description: VICTORY! The Crazy Swede brings home a big win to Summit Point, and fellow teammate Chris Cook makes it to the revered Top 16 for Round 4 of Formula D. This is how Team Mopar celebrates.
item.author: Mopar
item.itunes:subtitle: VICTORY! The Crazy Swede brings home a big win to Summit Point, and fellow teammate Chris Cook makes it to the revered Top 16 for Round 4 of Formula D. This is how Team Mopar celebrates.

item.title: Chryslers Kick It at Carlisle '07
item.description: The Mo-Pod video team captures the 2007 Chryslers at Carlisle event, one of the largest gatherings of Mopar enthusiasts EVER. Big thanks to the Mopar Mailing List (MML) for their hospitality and a great turnout!

item.title: Team Mopar, Stripped Down
item.description: Team Mopar "strips down" for an up close and personal look at your favorite Mopar drivers at the 2007 Mopar Block Party. Includes river rafting and one HOT bikini contest!

item.title: Standing Ovation
item.description: Tom "Hollywood" Hunsaker sent us some great footage that gives new meaning to "pick up and go." Plus, a special added bonus for the old schoolers: a commercial for the '66 Dodge Dart and some behind the scenes shots of the original Red Wagon.

item.description: Mo-Pod introduces "Inside the Slide," a new series that takes a behind-the-scenes look at the Mopar Drift Team. First up: The Crazy Swede gets ready for Round 1 of Formula D by letting loose on the streets of Long Beach and having some fun testing out the new Drift Charger.

item.title: Swedish Snakes
item.description: Martin Czernik, AKA the SwedishSnake, sends us footage straight from Sweden: watch how a fearless duo of Dodge Viper owners greets an import tuner crowd and then dominates the streets of Sweden. Mopar's kickin' it swedish style.
item.author: Mopar

item.title: Viper Hot Shots
item.description: Hot moves and hot bods: We take a Dodge Viper out for a little joyride and pit it against the Corvette speedster, and then you'll get a sneak peak into the smokin' photoshoot for Viper Magazine's feature on the Viper GTS motorcycle.

item.title: Mopar Cooks at the 2007 Chili Bowl
item.description: Fans brave freezing ice and snow to see Team Mopar heat up the 2007 Chili Bowl Midget Nationals. Kasey Kahne plays in the dirt, and Dave Darland brings home the pole for Team Mopar!

item.title: Kingdom Kahne for '07
item.description: Mopar's Kevin Miller introduces Kasey Kahne Racing at the 2006 Performance Racing Industry (PRI) Show as the future of Team Mopar's USAC and WoO efforts. Featuring interviews with Kasey Kahne, Joey Saldana and Brady Bacon.
